name: ATAKTANK
description:
Trapped behind enemy lines. Can you fight your way to safety?

This is my entry to the Low Effort Jam 9.

Controls:

  • W, Up Arrow = Accellerate
  • S, Down Arrow = Decellerate
  • A, D, Left Arrow, Right, Arrow = Turn tank
  • Move mouse to aim.
  • Left mouse button to shoot.
